content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 tart apples, cored and cubed" )

content.text: 1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and sliced" )

content.text: 1 fresh Anaheim chile, seeded and sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 fresh Anaheim chile, seeded and sliced" )
( ing-5 "2 tablespoons coarsely chopped fresh cilantro" )
( ing-6 "1/2 cup chopped walnuts, lightly toasted" )

content.text: 2 tablespoons fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "2 tablespoons fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, stir together apples and lime juice.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "stir"@20:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "apples"@34:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "lime juice"@45:55 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir in jalapeno and Anaheim chile slices.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "jalapeno"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "Anaheim chile slices"@24:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Stir in onion, cilantro, walnuts, ginger, and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "onion"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "cilantro"@18:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "walnuts"@28:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "ginger"@37:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "salt"@49:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
